name: Verify special notice period field in billing for NewBusiness transaction

testSteps.description: 1: Verify special notice period field in billing for NewBusiness transaction ({RiskState=Arizona, specialnoticeperiod=30})

children.description: Given underwriter has ability to create policy

And with insured address and location details
| StreetAddress | Line2 | City | State | Zip | Country |
| 47 W 13th St |  | South Portland | Arizona | 10011 |  |

And with Risk State
| Arizona |
| New York |
Then the 30 for Arizona should be reflected in Billing system

testSteps.description: 2: Verify special notice period field in billing for NewBusiness transaction ({RiskState=New York, specialnoticeperiod=10})

| Arizona |
| New York |
Then the 10 for New York should be reflected in Billing system

dataTable.scenarioOutline:
Given underwriter has ability to create policy
And with insured address and location details
And with Primary State 'Arizona'
And with Risk State
And underwriter creates WK policy
And policy is created successfully
When underwriter books the policy
Then the <specialnoticeperiod> for <RiskState> should be reflected in Billing system
